medical_history.chief_complaint: Right upper quadrant pain, shortness of breath, cough, and low-grade fevers.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began several days prior to presentation. The patient experienced worsening symptoms including continued RUQ pain, nausea, decreased appetite, and shortness of breath.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hyperlipidemia, colonic polyps, spontaneous pneumothorax.
medical_history.family_history: Father expired from liver and colon cancer. Mother with a history of gallstones, status post cholecystectomy.
